title: What Fills the Whitespace: 10 Surprising Lessons from Writing a Book

â€‹Writing a book is no small feat, especially when it revolves around rapidly-evolving technology. In this intimate session, delve deep into the hidden intricacies, challenges, and personal revelations experienced on Matt Goldman's journey of writing .NET MAUI in Action. ğŸ“–

Beyond the printed words lies a vast hidden realm of determination, discipline, feedback, emotional roller-coasters, and unexpected hurdles. Balancing a full-time job, personal commitments, and the continuous evolution of the technology, the process of writing isn't merely about churning out chapters. It's a deeply personal voyage, with lessons that transcend beyond the subject matter of the book itself. ğŸ§ ğŸ”„ï¸
